metadata.description: Severity scoring rules for MHSA — rule-based severity engine.
notes: Severity boundaries classify mild / moderate / severe

anxiety.description: Symptoms related to anxiety, worry, tension, panic.

depression.description: Symptoms related to low mood, loss of interest, hopelessness.

stress.description: General emotional strain, overwhelm, burnout indicators.

trauma.description: Trauma-related symptoms such as flashbacks, hypervigilance.

loneliness.description: Indicators of social disconnection or emotional isolation.

sleep_issues.description: Insomnia, irregular sleep, sleep disturbance patterns.

mild.label: mild
mild.description: Symptoms present but manageable. Basic coping strategies may help.

moderate.label: moderate
moderate.description: Symptoms affect daily life. Supportive interventions recommended.

severe.label: severe
severe.description: High distress. Professional help may be necessary.

safety_overrides.override_message: Safety keywords detected — applying severe level for safety.
